revised_title: The Cabbage-Bark Tree of Jamaica: Its Description, Uses, and Medicinal Properties
tldr: The author provides a detailed description of the Cabbage-bark Tree, also known as the Worm-bark Tree, found in Jamaica. He discusses its various parts, including the bark, wood, and fruit, and their uses in medicine, particularly as an anthelmintic. The author also outlines the different forms in which the cabbage-bark can be administered and provides dosage recommendations for different age groups.
